name: Mar-Ball (GGJ19)
description:
Our first ever game made after 2 months of game school, during the 2019 Global Game Jam. 

Of course we didn't even know what we were doing, but it's been so much fun.

Credits:

Alessia Mazzocchi, Alessandro Pantano

---> 3D:

---> GAME DESIGN:

---> SPECIAL THANKS:
